about_the_game:
You know what really killed the dinosaurs?

MewMew PewPew is a wave-based arena shooter, where you play as MewMew, whose home is invaded by vengeful dinosaurs. Destroy your enemies, collect game-changing power ups, and use upgrades to get stronger and deadlier.

Get ready for the ultimate Meowtastic Mayhem!

Features:

Beat 30 dino waves and one final boss wave. Grr.
MewMew is on top of his omnipotent dominance. Demonstrate this with Ego Boost, that amplifies your arsenal of upgrades and doubles your killing scores when activated.
Increase your Ego Status by killing enemies.
Juice up your arsenal by collecting power ups around the map.
Between every other wave, choose from dozens of upgrades, or even upgrade your upgrades! Find your favorite combination of upgrades and power ups and develop your build on your way to victory.
Compete with your dino killer colleagues with the Friends Leaderboard. See how you fare in the Local Leaderboard. Prove yourself and rise in the Global Leaderboard.

name: MewMew PewPew

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 1024MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 1
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: The dinosaurs have brought the fight to the wrong cat’s territory. Mess with MewMew, get the PewPew: It’s time to send the dinos right back to extinction.
